title: Stop Crying, It's Coming!
description: The best is still to come. In “Stop Crying, It’s Coming,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church challenges us to stop fixating on what we’ve lost and start focusing on what comes next.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: The best is still to come. In “Stop Crying, It’s Coming,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church challenges us to stop fixating on what we’ve lost and start focusing on what comes next.
